author: cbs8
title: Rolls-Royce Motor Cars Globally Launches Its Latest New Model, Rolls-Royce Dawn
text:
Rolls-Royce Motor Cars
GOODWOOD, England , Sept. 8, 2015 /PRNewswire/ --
What:
Rolls-Royce Motor Cars today globally unveiled its latest new model, the Rolls-Royce Dawn, during an exclusive online launch "Digital Dawn," featuring company CEO Torsten Muller Otvos. The unveil marks the first time in Rolls-Royce Motor Cars' history that a new model was launched globally online.
"Dawn is a beautiful new motor car that offers the most uncompromised open-top motoring experience in the world," said Rolls-Royce Motor Cars CEO Torsten Muller Otvos. "A true four-seater, it will be the most social of super-luxury drophead motor cars for those who wish to bathe in the sunlight of the world's most exclusive social hotspots."
Why:
The new Rolls-Royce Dawn promises a striking, seductive encounter like no other Rolls-Royce to date. The ultra-luxury brand staged the digital launch to reach its younger, connected and more active owner base – an increasingly diverse crowd of 40-45 years old.
Where:
Visit www.anewdawnformedia.com and enter the code rslnyooaldcerw for a recap of the presentation along with images, video and vehicle details.
Further information:
Imagery: http://bit.ly/1L7HRos B-Roll: http://bit.ly/1LTZlYg (Full B-Roll); http://bit.ly/1it5Szr (Dynamic Movie, Classic Dawn Footage, Final Tease) Press Packet: http://bit.ly/1LXMbfB Website: www.rolls-roycemotorcars.com Twitter: @RollsRoyceMCNA, @RollsRoyceMedia Instagram: @RollsRoyceCarsNA Hashtag: #RRDawn Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150904/263877
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/rolls-royce-motor-cars-globally-launches-its-latest-new-model-rolls-royce-dawn-300138781.html
